alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 29 at 9:50PM CDT until May 04 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. .Due to recent rainfall, water levels are looking to rise again back into Minor Flood Stage Sunday. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marsh River at Shelly. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning to a crest of 15.0 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
